name: TELEPHONE (fafasssssssss)
description:
Although she doesn't remember it anymore, things were never resolved after the incident. Years later, he came back. They both want to set things right. Only you can help, Catherine.

---------------------------------------------------------------

TELEPHONE is a story-driven sit-and-survive styled horror game, where the player is trapped in an unusual situation, and must fight for survival to uncover the truth.

Divided into 5 hours, the player must complete tasks in other to make time progress again, while defending themselves from the monster that lurks inside. If you manage to reach 5AM, you might just survive... or so he says.

Complete the tasks, Catherine.

---------------------------------------------------------------

[Made by / Feito por] :

Fabrício Galeza Amorim
